reviews.review: I remember this game being more fun.... and also the hours played at least for my account is screwed up and I wasn't able to return it....i haven't even finished the opening sequence and have 8.5 hours logged on the game
One of my favourite games, I have played it twice and even though its a bit old but its more interesting than some of the new games that are coming out lately.
I love this game back in the old days!  We could play deathmatch at LAN parties for hours!  The single player game was great as well.  Classic FPS game, so if you like FPS games, this is a must.
Solo puedo decir... FUAAAAAH
Classic
Nice!!!

Este juego es muy bueno, pero ni el mejor de la historia ni nada, est√° sobrevalorado.

TRAMA

No juegues este juego si no tienes pensado jugar al segundo, no te explican absolutamente nada, y no sabes ni porque te matan esos, ni porque matas a ese, ni hacia donde quieres llegar, y el final te deja a√∫n con mas dudas. Aunque lo bueno es el MISTERIO, porque puedes ver cosas extra√±as, y, por ejemplo se ve unas cuantas veces a un hombre con traje mirandote desde una zona inaccesible y yasta, y eso te incita a seguir jugando.

GAMEPLAY

Vale, el gameplay es bastante malo, las armas algunas veces hacen cosas extra√±as, vas JODIDAMENTE ECHANDO LECHES, y eso hace imposible ir por sitios estrechos. Y es que vas tan puto rapido que al bajar unas escaleras ANDANDO sales volando y te haces bastante da√±o (el da√±o por caide de este juego es innecesariamente alto). Las hitbox son bastante extra√±as y los putos objetos cuandos los empujas salen disparados y los pierdes. Tambi√©n, si no guardas por ti mismo en este juego repetiras horas y horas. El juego lleva un auto-aim totalmente innecesario, como si fueramos paraliticos o algo parecido. Y bueno, aun asi las armas estan bien echas, hay que administrarse la munici√≥n (esto es bueno) y NO hay vida regenerativa (que esto lo hace dificil y es bastante buevo). Los saltos son bastante tediosos, y el boss final me hizo sacar la barra espaciadora 3 veces.

MULTIJUGADOR

El multijugador es malillo por lo que he probado, pero no voy a hablar de el porque no le he echado horas ni pienso hacerlo.

CONCLUSI√ìN

Este juego no lo recomendaria, si no tubiera segunda parte, porque la segunda parte SI merece la pena. Si esta segunda parte no existiera el juego seria uno del mont√≥n, pero compralo, en oferta es 1$ por mas o menos 10-20h de juego.
Classic but good.

Amazing! Even with these old graphics, the atmosphere is so in-depth that I felt like I was actually there, in Gordon's shoes, or HEV Suit I should say!

The soundtrack is very fitting and helps even more with immersion and action sequences.

Ambient sound effects are also used very well.

The story is creative and fluid, with one event or objective leading to the next. Unlike any other shooter you see these days, Half-Life actually cares about its storytelling.

Character dialogue is intelligent and witty, even funny at times, and, of course, the gameplay itself is awesome.


[b]Everything about this game is perfect.[/b]

After playing the first Half-Life game, I highly recommend that you play its companion games, its sequel, and the episodes. They are so cool and even better than the first game.

I played this one in  2017 I played many other modern fps and other games and also Half life 2 and its episodes, but this game released in 1998 still striked me with action packed gameplay and decent story although there was one game braking bug (I got stuck in the pipe after loading screen I couldnt move and I had to google solutions) I still reccomend this game, especially for those who love half-life universe, This game is legend, one which stays in the place of honour in my library.
Recommend it to anyone who is new to Half-Life universe. It starts here.

Que por ejemplo disparando a la cabeza con una escopeta no le mate ni de 4 tiros...
La magnum esta chettada y bueno, las armas radioactivas ni te cuento
Graficamente no puedo pedir mas, sabiendo que estamos en 1998, aunque me he enterado hace poco que le han hecho como 2 remakes, el Source y Black Mesa
Pero esto hay que jugarlo en carnes el original, no me seas pussy del black mesa

Historia: aqui tengo que decirte una cosa, esto es historia visual porque si bien al principio te cuentan un par de cosas hasta el final no te van a contar de que va la vaina y aun asi te quedaran preguntas (o al menos a mi, ahor me vendran explicandome todo 100% "pe-pe-pe-pero Fei, es que hay mensajes por el..."

Y el boss final, no desvelo nada pero es de los bosses mas frustrantes contra los que he jugado
Las fisicas tambien reguleras, el "saltador" el 70% de las veces no va y otras te tira de repente
Si que quiero decir algo malo de mi experiencia que me ha sacado del juego: te obliga un poco a estar todo el rato guardando la partida y cargando puntos (mas que nada para no perder tiempo y para evitar perder la mayor cantidad posible de vida/armadura)

Pero vamos, que lo recomiendo

In Half-Life 1 is made such an innovative feature that the player who plays this game, associates himself with the main character - Gordon Freeman, it all contributes to a greater depth in the game. A first person view, a character that is always silent, no cutscene - all epic scenes happen before your eyes, all these features are made for you to go deeper into the game. It seems to be all cool, everything is gorgeous, a cult game and all that - but after all, think how you can associate yourself with the character of scientists ?? Something I strongly doubt that a typical Halflife player is a scientist. And these are obvious problems and drawbacks of the game, as it would be better to make a character with whom you can easily associate yourself. Even in the smashing trash of the endless summer, this moment is made better - a game for zachuhannyh zadrotov, and the protagonist of the game SEEDS - also zachuhanny zadrot. And in Half with this problem. You imagine, in the trash of the endless summer, even some aspects are made better than this cult of your Halflife !!!! And Freeman seems to be like a scientist, but when an apocalypse happens, he stupidly takes a bunch of trunks, and begins to shoot everyone - and de facto any typical scientist even a store can not attach to weapons, not to mention the fact that Freeman all wets left and right . And some sick on the whole head of the fans of Half-Life crow, that in the game a good story - yeah, a man who never took up arms, begins to wet the crowds of enemies - this is clearly not a good story, this is the bullshit of a blue mare. On the game, you can say a lot of bad, but I still went through it completely, so the game is not so bad, but in fact, not so good. Half-Life 1 game review Half-Life 1 game review

I thought it would be fun and live up to it's legendary status but in reality it plays like a tedious Minecraft parkour map. To clarify it's full of boring and reptitive platforming despite being a first person shooter. It's slow, the physics are bad, and it fails to understand the hip firing weapons is not an effective strategy. It's a relic of it's time an it has not aged well at all. I've heard that it pioneered the WASD control scheme and it would be a big deal if it weren't for the fact that statistically speaking it is very likely someone else would've figured it out anyways. But It's got a great atmosphere at the beginning and some mods out there look to be pretty fun.

When Valve was in the process of making Half-Life, it took them way longer than it should have. Why? Well because originally they had created an entire game that was supposed to be half life, but just before releasing it the developers decided to can the entire project and start again.

That, COD fans, is how you make a good game.
